meanings.definition: The state or quality of being puffy.
meanings.sent1: The puffinesses of the clouds made them look like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent2: Her face showed signs of puffinesses after crying for hours.

meanings.sent4: The puffinesses of the pastry dough resembled little clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The puffinesses of the pillow made it extra comfortable to sleep on.
